```
  âœ… Credits keyed by PUBLIC KEY (identity, not node)
  âœ… Same public key = same balance across devices
  âœ… Server-side ONLY credit increases
  âœ… Firestore is single source of truth
  âœ… Clients cannot self-report credits
  âœ… Persistent across sessions
  âœ… Atomic operations with cache
```

## Security Control Matrix

| Control | Type | Status | Risk Mitigated | Code Location |
|---------|------|--------|----------------|---------------|
| Origin Validation | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | CSRF, unauthorized access | Lines 255-263 |
| Connection Limits | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | DoS (single IP) | Lines 308-315 |
| Rate Limiting | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Message flooding | Lines 265-279 |
| Message Size Limits | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | DoS (large payloads) | Lines 338-342 |
| Heartbeat Timeout | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Zombie connections | Lines 320-329 |
| Task Assignment Tracking | Detective | âœ… Implemented | Completion spoofing | Lines 222-229 |
| Assignment Verification | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Completion spoofing | Lines 411-423 |
| Replay Prevention | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Replay attacks | Lines 425-430 |
| Self-Report Blocking | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Credit fraud | Lines 612-622 |
| Server-Only Crediting | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Credit fraud | Lines 119-129 |
| QDAG Ledger | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Credit tampering | Lines 66-117 |
| Task Expiration | Preventive | âœ… Implemented | Stale assignments | Lines 243-253 |
| Signature Verification | Preventive | âŒ NOT Implemented | Identity spoofing | Lines 281-286 |
| Challenge-Response | Preventive | âŒ NOT Implemented | Registration fraud | N/A |
| Global Conn Limit | Preventive | âŒ NOT Implemented | Distributed DoS | N/A |
